name: Village Tanuki
description:
"I collected all the berries, but at what cost?"

A short game made for my internship program at Mojiken Studio, mojikencamp 2021 for around 3 weeks. I'm not the best at making games nor a great story teller, but I hope you had fun playing this and understood the message I wanted to convey.

Story

Village Tanuki is a narrative based, maze chase game.

You are playing as JUN, one of many tanukis (Japanese racoon dog) that works in a certain tanuki group in a forest. The group is infamous for their excellent job at foraging and distributing berries throughout other tanukis in the forest. Your job is to collect berries from human villages to please your boss. Can you do it?

Controls & Feature

Move: Arrow keys
Continue dialogue: left click mouse on dialogue box

This game is relatively easy to play, so you can relax and enjoy the story.

Duration: ±5 minutes

Credits

Game by ameriya
Music by ameriya made with https://www.bandlab.com/
Title Font by Andrew Tyler https://www.dafont.com/pixelmix.font
SFX downloaded from https://freesound.org/

Thank you for playing, and don't forget to rest.

Feedback are greatly appreciated :)

Social media and contact information: https://ameriya7.carrd.co/
